mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TESTBBS WHERE DEL != 1 ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TESTBBS(SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, REF, STEP, DEPTH, DEL, READCOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_TESTBBS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1, 0)FROM TESTBBS), 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE TESTBBS SET DEL = 1 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
